data.text: @BWI_Airport 🥳✈🙌❤
@livethruliv This matter has been shared with the appropriate department leadership. - GM

@livethruliv We are extremely disappointed to learn that the service you received from our flight attendants did not meet your expectations. All of our team members are expected to assist however they can to provide a satisfactory travel experience.

@Dean_Nelson_RN Hi Dean. We're sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. Feel free to send us a DM with your request. Please include your confirmation number and email. We look forward to hearing from you real soon. - GM

data.text: @ShaneBurkett We're so sorry you are having a hard time purchasing a flight. Our recommendation is to clear your cache and cookies. Also, please make sure you are using Google Chrome. If you have any other questions, please reach to us in a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@kiaracole77 Hi Kiara! We're sorry to hear about this. Please be aware that all calls are monitored and recorded for quality assurance purposes. If you are seeking assistance or wish to discuss this matter further, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

The moment you set out on your first solo flight, you knew you were right where you were supposed to be. Happy #WorldPilotsDay to those who prove your dreams can truly take flight. ✈ https://t.co/qvFRhoZIRj
@birdmom9726 Hi there. We're so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@flyer_tony That is when service on that particular route begins. We are not offering service before then, unfortunately. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@flyer_tony Hi Antoine! We do offer service in and out of PBG. For rates and availability, please visit our official website. https://t.co/HH4XDGQ907 - C
@Tami_Prostrollo Thank you for recognizing our efforts, Tami! -JH 🙌 🧡 💙

@dougthedrummer1 Hey there Doug! We LOVE hearing this and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience and feedback with us. We look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you aboard again in the future. 😀💙🧡💛 - C

@SSantiago40 Hi Suzanne! We are sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. If you are seeking assistance or have questions or concerns that you would like us to address for you, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@Peff0923 Hi there! Our Face Covering Policy is available for review in its entirety on our official website here: https://t.co/0MsU3Acbin It is clearly stated that neck gaiters are prohibited. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@2ChaiGirl Hi there! Our apologies for any hold time. Customer Care can be reached 24/7 at 702-505-8888. It is recommended to contact us during “off-peak” hours which is typically from 9 pm - 4 am PT. -JH
@RedWingsTiffany Thank you. Your message will be answered in the order it was received. We appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard. - C

@RedWingsTiffany Hi Tiffany! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take calls at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone. If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

One of our favorite days of the year is finally here - it's time for @MakeAWishSNV's annual Walk for Wishes! ⏰ We're proud to present this incredible event that supports children with critical illnesses, bringing them hope when they need it most. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/gKBefbObMN
@bearded_gr81 We're sorry to hear of your travel experience. If in need of assistance, send us a DM and we would be happy to review your flight details. -JH
@Schoolboy_Skum Hey CT! We're very sorry to hear of your frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@CarlosD09185682 Hey Carlos! We regret that the upkeep of the aircraft on your recent flight did not meet your expectations, and apologize for any discomfort this may have caused. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience and hope to welcome you back under more favorable conditions. -JH
@GAPetruccelli Hey Gina! We show you have sent us a DM, thanks for reaching out. -JH

@lou594 Hi there Luis! If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. A member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C
@kidshacky Hey Tony! For assistance with troubleshooting tools, please send us a DM. -JH

Name that skyline! 🏙️

📸: plane. photos https://t.co/9DYvGOtllk

@greenbergepi All customers are required to wear a face covering at all times. Our crew is committed to enforcing our policies and safety measures to the best of their abilities. If someone isn't wearing a face covering on your flight, please alert the nearest crew member immediately. - JH
@hcidm Hi Hector! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. -GM https://t.co/ehIvBuBVaM

@FitToTheMax24 We are disappointed to learn that the service you received from the airport agents did not meet your expectations. This matter has been shared with the appropriate department leadership for internal follow up to ensure that any necessary corrective counseling is provided. - GM

@chinanderm Hi Matt! It can take time to receive a response via email from our Customer Relations Department, as emails are answered in the order they are received. You can also send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you'd like. - C
@SaltLifeRyan We'll certainly pass along your feedback to our teams for consideration! Enjoy your time in Vegas! - SG

data.text: @JessMagdefrau @LASairport Very cool! Are you going to check out any national parks? - SG
@ctwin53_carla Hi Carla! We're sorry to hear that you feel this way. Our records indicate that your issue has been addressed to extent of our abilities. - C

@KentWilliams13 Hi Kent! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa with the reservation information and the specific details of your request. A member of our team will gladly review your options with you ASAP. - C

@FlaniganDan Hi Dan! Plz check your DMs. 🙂 - C

@witzy88 Hi Stacey! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. If you need help troubleshooting or have general questions or concerns, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@sungryl5 Hi there! While we do not have plans to offer this service in the immediate future, this is something that we have been considering for some time. Hopefully we can offer this route as time goes on. 😎🤞 - C

@Sage_Words There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a representative over the phone. We sincerely appreciate your patience as we work to assist each caller in the order they reach out to us. You may also send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa if you have questions or concerns. - C

urls.title: Cheap Airline Tickets & Vacation Packages - Allegiant Air
urls.description: Hello, You have points ($ available to spend) ^Promotion begins at 12 a.m. PT, 07/04/2020 and ends 11:59 p.m. PT, 07/07/2020. Offers and travel dates are limited and vary by hotel. Blackout dates may apply and vary by hotel. All offers are based on availability, non-transferable and have no cash value. Management reserves the right to cancel or modify the promotion at any time. Not valid on previous reservations. Other restrictions may apply. ††Sale begins at 12 a.m. PT, 07/04/2020 and ends 11:59 p.m.

data.text: @lylac_10 He is the BEST, we'll be sure to relay your message! -JH 🙌 🙌 🙌

@Nick_Buckley_ Hi Nick! This is standard practice for all airlines. We will not accept valuables such as keys, medications or money in checked baggage. Learn more here: https://t.co/ChCEjDCgx0
If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@bluehutch Hi Adam! Crew members may reseat boarded customers to provide additional distancing when possible. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C
@lylac_10 Hi Nancy! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2H2g9v. - C

@tamf_ Hi there! If you are seeking assistance with a specific reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa with the reservation details. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C

@Daley332 Hi Marc! Thanks for reaching out with this question. All customers two years of age and older are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times while traveling. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@lylac_10 Hi Nancy! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2H2g9v. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@bmking72 Our baggage policy is available for review on our official website here: https://t.co/4An4mQhGZe
If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C
Chasing sunrises. ☀ https://t.co/l7yUHIzUpm

@MrsNianouris Hi Heather! As of this moment, we have no private messages or DMs from you.  We will be happy to look into this for you, if you are willing to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa with the reservation information and the details of your request. - C
@anniebananiii3 Hi Annie! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@Sarahbearr_30 Hey Sarah! If you are seeking assistance or have specific questions regarding a flight you had with us, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C
@MarkettaCrum Hi Marketta! Our apologies for any frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. A member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -JH

@YinzerGenius Hi there! Ticket counters are open 2 hours prior to each scheduled departure, however, will close 45 minutes before your departure time. Please send us a DM and a member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -JH

@xmerlyn Hey Christopher! Modifications can be made under the 'Manage Travel' portal, on our public website or mobile app, as long as you have not checked in. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@MedicalAdvocacy We show you have sent a few messages on our platforms and would be happy to assist. As advised, please send us a DM/PM to review. -JH
@MedicalAdvocacy Hi Alicia! We are so sorry to hear that you had missed your flight and for any inconvenience. To review your flight details, please send us a DM. -JH

@__sierranicole I am so sorry for any frustrations. Allegiant  does not tolerate harassment, discrimination, bullying, or any such speech or conduct in the workplace. All reports of such conduct are taken very seriously and investigated and addressed. - GM
@KristenVNavarro Hi Kristen! Feel free to send us a DM at any time. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@WitkneeLawz Hi there! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@concertjunkie17 Hi Krystal! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that a member of our team can look into this with you. - C

@Yinzerinkc Hi there! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text:
@lissarogers We’re so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please email us about your missing baggage here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K

data.text:
@NY1Tricia If you are interested, this information is stated on our public website here: https://t.co/PMGzuy8xec
- C
@MeganSupernaw Hi there! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@meganfinnerty19 Hi Megan! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ the voucher information so that a member our team can look into that for you ASAP. - C

@stephhh_ward Hi Steph! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. - C

@a_briae Hi there! Our website is up and running at this time. If you are having trouble on your end, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that a member of our team can troubleshoot with you. - C

@Leggyraptor Hi Shelly! We're sorry to hear that you're having trouble unsubscribing from our email list. When you do this successfully, you only need to do it once. If you need help with this process, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@SauceCastillo7 Hi Michael! We're sorry to hear you missed you flight. There is little that our airport reps can do for you, if you do not arrive in time to make your flight. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@Mickster05 Our webchat agents cannot make your desired modification for you. This must be done with the assistance of one of our representatives over the phone. We appreciate your patience. - C

@acarpxo Hi Alex! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. Please be assured that there is always a valid reason for any change or cancellation to any given Allegiant flight. If you are in need of assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@Mickster05 Hi Micki! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone. We appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard. - C

@1_Fallen_Angel_ Hi Angel! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. Unfortunately, delays are a necessary evil in air travel. This is part of the reason why air travel is safest mode of transportation available. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@sam_mcnamara19 We're sorry to hear that your flights were canceled. If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@lou594 Hi Luis! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and a member of our team will gladly review your options with you ASAP. - C

@Mixondg Hi Dave! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with your ASAP. - C

@Mixondg Hi Dave! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with your ASAP. - C

@NY1Tricia Hi Tricia! Please be advised that it is clearly stated in the confirmation email for any traveler under the age of 18yrs old traveling alone that they will not be permitted to board any weather advised flight. - C

@amber_matarelli Hi Amber! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and a member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C

@Princess_Issa77 Hi Melissa! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. While unfortunate, delays are a necessary evil in air travel and are in no way unique to Allegiant. If you're in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@espinozalorenzo Hi Lorenzo! We're sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction. Please be aware that our baggage policies are publicly available on our website https://t.co/SlVrQHmwqL and our representatives are expected to enforce our policies. If you're in need of assistance, you may send us a DM. -C

@adambabs15 Hi Adam! This is not normal. We are experiencing an unprecedented number of calls all at once due to flight disruptions outside of our control. If you are still in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we can help. - C

@taylurje Hi there! We're so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation info and a member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C
@AnungUnRamAnt Hi there! We are so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@daboyss43 Hi Jeff! We are sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your inquiry. - C

@KerithRae Hi there! If you have questions or concerns regarding a specific reservation, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ the reservation details and the specifics of your inquiry. - C

@markhd1 Hi Mark! Thanks for reaching out with this question. Our records indicate that today's flight 994 with service from SGF to PIE has been delayed. The flight is now estimated to depart at 8:55 PM and is estimated to arrive at 12:02 AM. Check out: https://t.co/g7LHcf3HR9 - C
